brand.name: ChatMate
brand.description: ChatMate is a cross-platform mobile client application for chatbots, developed based on the OpenAI API. It supports iOS and Android platforms and has diverse robot definition functions. With ChatMate, you can chat with robots and get intelligent answers to your questions or needs. The user-friendly design and easy-to-use interface of ChatMate make interacting with robots easier and more enjoyable.

placeholder.openLinkFailAndTryAgain: Failed to load, try to open in default browser?!

sync.syncFail: Sync Failed, Please Try Again Later
sync.restoreFromIcloudTips: Restoring from iCloud will overwrite local data. Do you want to continue?
sync.overwriteCloudDataTips: Overwriting cloud data will overwrite local data with cloud data. Do you want to continue?

apikey.title: Enter your API Key
apikey.description: You can get your API Key from OpenAI Dashboard.

apiserver.title: Enter your API Server
apiserver.description: You can use your own API server or use OpenAI's official API server.
apiserver.verifyFail: API Server is invalid, click to learn more.
apiserver.systemServerCannotEdit: The default server cannot be edited.

edit.chatTitleDescription: The chat title is displayed in the sidebar and chat interface title bar.
edit.chatUserNameDescription: The user name is displayed in the chat interface.
edit.chatAvatarLinkDescription: The avatar link is displayed in the chat.
edit.chatPromptDescription: The Prompt needs to be concise, logical, and able to be better understood and executed by ChatGPT as your little assistant.
edit.chatPromptPlaceholder:
Example 1: Please translate the following text into English: [‰Ω†Â•Ω]
Example 2: Please rhyme the following text:
edit.editApiIdentifierDescription: A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.

action.languageSettingDescription: The language setting will take effect after restarting the app.
action.lightModeSettingDescription: If theme is set to auto, the light theme will be used when in light mode.
action.nightModeSettingDescription: If theme is set to auto, the night theme will be used when in night mode.
action.chatModelSettingDescription: When selecting a model, please make sure you have the corresponding model API permissions?!
action.copiedUrl: The link has been copied to the clipboard.

confirm.clearConversations: Are you sure you want to clear all conversations?
confirm.clearConversationsAndInit: Conversations cleared, and generate some useful prompts.
confirm.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete ### ?
confirm.renameConfirm: Are you sure you want to rename ### ?
confirm.copyConfirm: Are you sure you want to copy ### ?
confirm.exportConfirm: Are you sure you want to export ### ?
confirm.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?
confirm.changeThemeConfirm: Are you sure you want to change theme?
confirm.changeLanguageConfirm: Switching the interface language requires restarting the app. Are you sure?

prompt.noTips: No set prompt, recommended to set max messages to 3, which can help GPT understand the context and provide more accurate answers.

openai.temperature: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
openai.maxMessagesInContext: Number of context messages. If it is 0, then no context is used. If it is 1, the most recent message will be used. If it is 2, the two most recent messages will be used and so on.
openai.maxTokensPerReply: The maximum number of tokens, including prompt words, allowed in each reply.
openai.maxTokensInContext: The maximum number of tokens, including prompt words, allowed in the context when the number of previous messages is greater than zero.
openai.apiIdentifier: A unique identifier representing your end-user, which can help OpenAI to monitor and detect abuse.
openai.networkTimeout: Network connection timeout (seconds), recommended setting is 60 seconds.
openai.streamMessage: GPT returns messages in a streaming manner, which allows for faster responses.
openai.showModelName: Display the model name in the message input box.
openai.showWordCount: Display the character count at the bottom of the message bubble.
openai.showEstimatedTokenCount: Display the token consumption and estimated cost at the bottom of the message bubble.
openai.renderMd: Render the GPT response content in Markdown.

chat.conversationOrderBy: The sorting method for the conversation list in the sidebar.
chat.alwaysShowPrompt: Always show the prompt word at the top of the chat conversation.
chat.alwaysNewChat: Create a new chat conversation every time the application is opened.
chat.isLoadEarlier: Load messages in pages to avoid loading too many messages and causing the page to lag.

setting.pasteFromClipboard: When the application is launched, the content is fetched from the clipboard and a chat is created for the content of the line containing the placeholder with the prompt.

errors.icloudError: iCloud synchronization failed. Please check if you are logged in to your Apple ID or if there is a network issue.
errors.speech: Text-to-speech failed. It may be due to the current device not supporting text-to-speech or there being issues with the device's speech settings.
errors.nosetApiKey: Please set your OpenAI API Key in the settings page.
errors.accountCostFail: Failed to retrieve account information, possibly due to an invalid API Key or unstable network connection.
errors.setApiKey: Please set your OpenAI API key in the setting page.
errors.networkError: Network encountered problems, it may be due to unstable network connection or server issues. Please try again later.
errors.maxTokensPerReplyError: The number of tokens generated by the current message exceeds the maximum number of tokens per message. Please reduce the length of the message or increase the maximum number of tokens per message.
errors.maxTokensInContextError: The number of tokens generated by the current context messages exceeds the maximum number of tokens in context. Please reduce the number of context messages or increase the maximum number of tokens in context.

feature.messageBubble:
Tap the message bubble for quick actions. You can modify the default behavior in chat settings. 

Long-press on the message bubble to perform operations such as copying and exporting messages.
feature.fetchShortcuts: Long-press on the filter button to fetch the latest prompt library.
feature.apiServerLongPress: Long press the API server to edit and delete the server.
feature.chatBubblePress: Tap the message bubble for quick actions. You can modify the default behavior in chat settings.
feature.apiKeyTableRowLongPress: Long press on 'API key' to query account usage.
feature.rowClickShowDetail: Click on the row title to view the function description.

tips.copyCode: Copyed the code to the clipboard.
tips.effectOnRestart: The setting will take effect after restarting the app.
tips.messageStat: Chat conversation "{title}" has {messages} GPT messages and consumes {tokens} tokens, cost ${cost}.
tips.chatPrompt: The available placeholders include: „Äå „Äé [ „Äê „Äç „Äè ] „Äç, such as: [hello],„Äåhello„Äç„ÄÅ„Äéhello„Äè„ÄÅ„Äêhello„Äë. Placeholders are not mandatory. If there are multiple placeholders in the prompt word, please enter them on a new line when sending the message to correspond with each placeholder.
tips.onRequestWait: Writing a message, please wait a moment. üòÅ
tips.underDevelopment: This feature is still under development, maybe the next version.
tips.modelPermissionCheck: Before using, please confirm that you have permission of to use the ### model.
tips.urlScheme: When using URL Scheme, be sure to use URL encoding for parameters in the URL to avoid unpredictable errors.
tips.openShortcutCopyed: The shortcut has been copied and can be used to send messages through the shortcut. To modify the content settings, please change the 'say' parameter.
tips.fetchingLatestShortcuts: Fetching the latest prompts, the amount of data is relatively large, please wait a moment
tips.fetchingLatestShortcutsError: Failed to fetch the latest prompts. Please try again later.
tips.fetchingLatestShortcutsSuccess: Successfully fetched the latest prompts. {count} in total.
tips.detectClipboardPrompt: Detected {count} prompt in clipboard, as follows: {prompt}. do you import it?
tips.accountCostQueryingTips: Checking account information, please wait for a moment.
tips.accountCostDetail: From {startDate} to {endDate}, your {plan} account {account} has a total of ${totalAmount}, with ${totalUsage} used and ${remaining} remaining.
tips.themeAuto: If set to Auto, it will switch automatically with the appearance setting of the system.
